detectors.description:
ClashOfClans.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ClashOfClans.sol#80-87) can write the state variable array at will

detectors.description: Parameter ClashOfClans.balanceOf(address)._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ClashOfClans.sol#101) is not in mixedCase

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ClashOfClans.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ClashOfClans.sol#101-103)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ClashOfClans.sol#14)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:

	- ClashOfClans.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ClashOfClans.sol#80-87)

	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ClashOfClans.sol#33)
	- ClashOfClans.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ClashOfClans.sol#105-109)
